item.title: Android Debug Bridge (ADB)
item.description: Login to shell of Android device adb root db remount adb shell Resources Android Developers - Android Debug Bridge (adb)

item.title: F-Droid
item.description: Download F-Droid Additional Repos IzzyOnDroid F-Droid Repository

item.title: LineageOS
item.description: Open-source Android distribution (OS) Samsung Galaxy Tab 3 10in (3G) TWRP Installation Download Heimdall (link below) Access TWRP (link below) Volume Up + Power + Home button Release for Samsung splash screen No MTP/OTG Access Connect USB adb push /dir/rom.zip /sdcard ROM Installation Try MTP/OTG or use adb Move ROM.zip to device storage (unzip not necessary) Install (or wipe then install) Wipe the cache afterwards (clears out the ROM)

item.title: Termux
item.description: Free and open-source Android terminal emulator Lite Installation pkg install openssh libcurl curl bash -c "$(curl -fsSL https://git.io/oh-my-termux)" termux-setup-storage Community Repos curl -LO https://its-pointless.github.io/setup-pointless-repo.sh bash setup-pointless-repo.sh Change package mirrors (if syncing issues) termux-change-repo Resources Github - Termux Application
